GameModel.Things

Class Thing

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel.Things.Thing
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Achievement, Item, LivingThing, Objective, PhysicalThing, Place, Quest

    public class Thing
extends java.lang.Object
    A Thing is an object that has a name,number, status, and description
